Dylan Ryan

I am a sophomore at THE Ohio State University studying Computer Science and Engineering and Applied Mathematics in the honors college. I am on track to graduate at a 4-year pace (05/2028) but I am considering pursuing a master's degree in Computer Science which would delay my graduation date.

I am also a member of our University's fastest growing club, the Scarlet Investment Group (SIG). SIG meets weekly with intent to give students industry experience and practical knowledge in the fields of quantitative analysis and investment banking. SIG provides the opportunity to meet industry professionals and gain insights into the finance world.
